folder.title: Universal Analytics
folder.description: Universal Analytics is a complete GWT wrapper for Google's Universal Analytics Library.

entry.name: index
entry.title: Overview
entry.description: Universal Analytics is a complete GWT wrapper for Google's Universal Analytics Library.

entry.name: setup
entry.title: How to Setup
entry.description: Step by step basic and advanced installation.

entry.name: usage
entry.title: Basic Usage
entry.description: Inject Analytics into the class you want to track events from.

entry.name: server
entry.title: Using Analytics on the Server
entry.description: You can use analytics on the server exactly the same as you do on the client.

entry.name: timing
entry.title: Tracking App Speed (Timing Events)
entry.description: You can track how fast things happen in your app by using timing events.

entry.name: plugins
entry.title: Plugins
entry.description: Universal Analytics supports the default Analytics plugins.

entry.name: fallback
entry.title: Using a Fallback Server
entry.description: Setting a fallback and serving from a subdomain.

entry.name: nativeApps
entry.title: Analytics for Native Apps (Cordova etc..)
entry.description: You can use Universal Analytics in native apps built with Cordova and other tools.
